cards.title: Orbit
powers: {Orbit} deals up to 2 targets 1 projectile damage.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.

openingLines.default: Distance and speed are set. Let's get things flying.

cards.title: Fractured Backdrop
body: After Orbit deals this card damage, this card deals up to 4 targets 2 projectile damage.
When this card is destroyed, this card deals up to 3 targets 1 projectile damage.

cards.title: Heavy Blockade
body: After Orbit deals this card damage, this card deals 1 target 2 projectile damage and 1 melee damage.
When this card is destroyed, this card deals 1 target 2 melee damage.

cards.title: Volatile Barricade
body: After Orbit deals this card damage, this card deals up to 2 targets 2 toxic damage.
When this card is destroyed, you may destroy up to 2 ongoing or environment cards and this card deals up to 2 targets 1 toxic damage each.

flavorQuotes.text: These fights would have much less {br}collateral damage if villains followed {br}standard safety regulations.

cards.title: Collision Course
body: Play this card next to a target.
{Orbit} deals that target 2 melee damage now.
After that target is dealt damage by a target other than Orbit, you may have that target deal 1 other target 3 melee damage. If you do, destroy this card.

cards.title: Corrective Motion
body: Play this card next to a target.
{Orbit} deals that target 2 melee damage now.
When that target would be dealt damage by a target other than Orbit, you may increase that damage by 2. If you do, destroy this card.

cards.title: Guide the Blow
body: Play this card next to a target.
{Orbit} deals that target 2 melee damage now.
When that target deals damage, you may redirect that damage to another target. If you do, destroy this card.

cards.title: Control the Field
cards.powers: Search your deck for 2 cover cards and play them. Shuffle your deck. Destroy this card.
body: At the start of your turn, destroy 2 cover cards.
Reduce damage deal to {Orbit} by 1 for each cover card in play.

cards.title: Landscape Awareness
cards.powers: Draw 1 card. {Orbit} deals 1 target 1 projectile damage.
body: Damage dealt by {Orbit} to Hero targets is irreducible and cannot be increased.

cards.title: Objects in Motion
cards.powers: Any hero may use a power. Any hero may play a card. If a card is played this way, destroy this card.
body: During your turn, increase damage dealt by targets other than {Orbit} by 1.

cards.title: Orbital Slingshot
body: After an orbital card is destroyed, you may move it under this card.
At the end of your turn, destroy all cards under this card. Then, {Orbit} may deal 1 target 1 projectile damage. Increase this damage by 2 for each card destroyed this way.

flavorQuotes.text: There are few things as satisfying as {br}getting to line up the perfect shot.

cards.title: Subtle Preparation
powers: Draw a card or play a card.
body: When this card enters play, you may draw 2 cards and play up to 2 cards.
{Orbit} cannot deal damage.
At the start of your turn, destroy this card.

cards.title: Wreck the Wreckage
body: {Orbit} deals 1 target 1 melee damage. Increase this damage by 1 for each Cover card in your trash.
Play 1 Cover card from your trash.

flavorQuotes.text: I can only manipulate so many {br}things at once. But if something I'm manipulating {br}shatters... Well, is it still one thing?

cards.title: Rapid Fire
body: {Orbit} deals up to 3 targets 1 projectile damage.
{Orbit} deals up to 2 targets 2 projectile damage.

flavorQuotes.text: A thrown stone can knock someone out. {br}These are a lot faster than thrown stones.

cards.title: Redesignate
body: Put any number of Cover or Orbital cards in play back in your hand.
Draw a card for each card returned to your hand this way.
Play up to 2 Cover or Orbital cards.

promoCards.title: Orbit - Artificial Satellite
powers: Reduce damage dealt to {Orbit} by 1 until the start of your next turn. Orbit deals 1 target 1 irreducible projectile damage.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.

openingLines.default: Eyes in the sky are here. Let's see just where things land.
